email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We have a spot enquiry for 85,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this route? The laycan window is flexible, ideally starting from October 10.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 180,000, LOA 300m, currently open in Santos. The initial freight quote is USD 22.50 per metric tonne under CIF terms. The laycan window can be adjusted to October 10-15.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 22.50 seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you review this and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the expected loading time in Tubarão?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 21.75 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 18,000 per day, and the expected loading time in Tubarão is 3 days, weather permitting.

Let me know if this revised offer works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 21.75 per metric tonne. Please proceed with the booking for MV OCEAN HORIZON with the laycan window of October 10-15. Kindly send over the recap for final confirmation.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao - Recap Sent
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. I have sent over the recap for the shipment. Please review and let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best,
Sophia

[ATTACHMENTS: recap.pdf]
